Title: Authorizes the Ruth AME Zion Church to file with the town of Brookhaven assessor an application for certain real property tax exemptions
Summary: Authorizes the Ruth AME Zion Church to file with the town of Brookhaven assessor an application for certain real property tax exemptions.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the Ruth AME Zion Church to file with the town of Brookhaven assessor an application for certain real property tax exemptions
